excerpt: "The term was coined in 1971 by Tetsuro Mori, an engineer at robotics company, Yaskawa Electric Corp. He combined the words \"mechanical\" and \"electronic\" to describe the electronic control systems that Yaskawa was building for mechanical factory equipment."
